ObjectClass.Name: Auto-Turret
ObjectClass.Description:
AUTO-TURRET: Robust defensive weapon emplacement
Self-repairing using Energy Upgradeable to detect cloaked units

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack specified target \ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\All: 50, R 21, SR 2

Objective.Name: Upgrade to Sensor Turret
Objective.Details: \Enables Turret to detect cloaked units \ \Increases Turret's attack and vision range \Decreases HP and attack speed

Objective.Name: Upgrade to Sensor Turret
Objective.Details: Not available \ Requires Ground-Tech\ upgrade at the FACTORY

ObjectClass.Name: Sensor Turret
ObjectClass.Description:
SENSOR AUTO-TURRET: Anti-cloak defensive emplacement
Detects cloaked units Self-repairing using Energy

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack specified target \ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\All: 200, R 25, SR 2

ObjectClass.Name: Turret (Wreckage)
ObjectClass.Description:
This Turret is destroyed
No risk from further internal explosions
